Kaderníka Cristiana Ronalda našla upratovačka mnohonásobne dobodaného v jeho hotelovej izbe
04 Nov 2019, 14:52 by Alexandra Murajdová

Upratovačka scénu opísala ako masaker.

Muža, ktorého našla upratovačka mŕtveho na hoteli v Zürichu, už identifikovali. Je to Ricardo Marques Ferreira, vlasový stylista Cristiana Ronalda. Našli ho v piatok poobede na jeho posteli s viacerými bodnými ranami, informuje newsweek.



facebook/Ricardo Marques Ferreira


Upratovačka, ktorá ho našla, tvrdí, že sa chystala upratať jeho izbu, keď ho našla. Scénu opísala ako: „masaker“. „Ležal na posteli, všade bola krv a v tele mal viac rán,“ povedala. Dodala, že v izbe bol výrazný zápach alkoholu. Na recepcii neskôr priznali, že im volalo viac hostí so sťažnosťou na hluk, ktorý vychádzal z ich izby.
Vražedná zbraň sa na mieste nenašla, no odvtedy polícia už zatkla jedného podozrivého, ktorý je podľa všetkého z Brazílie. Zatiaľ k incidentu nebol vydaný žiaden oficiálny komentár, miestna polícia len potvrdila, že sa to stalo. Nevieme ani motív činu, polícia vo vyhlásení tvrdí, že všetko je predmetom vyšetrovania.




ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ

Hairdresser Cristian Ronald was found by a housekeeper many times stabbed in his hotel room
04 Nov 2019, 14:52 by Alexandra Murajdova

The housekeeper described the scene as a massacre.

The man who was found dead by a cleaning woman at a hotel in Zurich has already been identified. It's Ricardo Marques Ferreira, Cristiano Ronald's hair stylist. He was found on Friday afternoon on his bed with several stab wounds, reports newsweek.



facebook / Ricardo Marques Ferreira


The housekeeper who found him says she was going to clean his room when she found him. She described the scene as: "massacre". "He was lying on the bed, there was blood everywhere, and there were more wounds in his body," she said. She added that there was a strong smell of alcohol in the room. At the reception they later admitted that they were calling more guests with a complaint about the noise coming from their room.
The murder weapon was not found on the spot, but since then the police have already arrested one suspect, who appears to be from Brazil. No official comment has been made on the incident so far, the local police only confirmed that it had happened. We do not even know the motive of the crime, the police say in the statement that everything is under investigation.
